review: It works pretty well.  Loads quickly, good picture quality.  The remote is almost absurdly small however and the whole Free Prime thing is kind of misleading.  It seems like every other thing I select to watch is not free, in fact it's all pretty steep.  A new movie, can't remember which one, was $4.99 to rent!  Seriously?  Redbox had them for $1.49.
